targets.expr: avg(sum(container_memory_rss{namespace="hs-core", source_cluster=~"$cluster", container="main", pod=~"hs-core-config-store.*"}) by (pod)/sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="hs-core", source_cluster=~"$cluster", container="main", pod=~"hs-core-config-store.*"}) by (pod))

max(sum(container_memory_rss{namespace="hs-core", source_cluster=~"$cluster", container="main", pod=~"hs-core-config-store.*"}) by (pod)/sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="hs-core", source_cluster=~"$cluster", container="main", pod=~"hs-core-config-store.*"}) by (pod))
